pastEvents.title: HoverX
pastEvents.description: From concept to flight! Our hands-on drone-making workshop, HOVERX was a soaring success. Participants explored the mechanics of drone making and witnessed live flight demos of two fully functional drones. The journey of learning & innovation continues.

pastEvents.title: Pujo Pixel
pastEvents.description: A completely virtual photography event organized by IEI Students' Chapter EE to celebrate Durga Puja. It was based on three themes, and participants could take part in all or any one. The winner of each theme was awarded a cash prize of ₹200.

pastEvents.title: IOTricity
pastEvents.description: A hardware ideathon event, the first of its kind at AOT campus. The event focused on IoT (Internet of Things), a rapidly growing field. The event had a prize pool of ₹6000.

pastEvents.title: Electroforge
pastEvents.description: An invited talk and hands-on workshop on printed circuit boards, featuring Mr. Dipak Chakraborty. The event aimed to provide practical insights into the design, fabrication, and application of PCBs in modern electronics.
